# SWAttributionView.DisplayContext

**Enumeration**

The context for the content that influences the ranking of this view’s highlight.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DisplayContext
```

## Overview

Set the appropriate display context on [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWAttributionView] before the system adds the view to a window. This informs the system about how the user is consuming the attributed content, and influences future relevancy ranking of the [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWHighlight] for this view.

## Context styles

- **SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.summary**: Indicates that the system is offering the attributed content shown along with this view to the user for consumption.
- **SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.detail**: Indicates that the attributed content shown along with this view is being actively consumed by the user.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Customizing the view

- **SWAttributionView.BackgroundStyle**: The background styling of the attribution view’s contents.
- **SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment**: The horizontal alignment of attribution view’s contents.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
